Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
